name: [deleted]
text:
Its under advanced options. There should be several strange options. One sets the world's age. Older the planet, more mountains and hills are eroded. An old world is "flatter" than a young world. One adjusts rainfall, which shifts balance of jungle vs desert. One toggles resource levels, and another handles start locations. 

They are big game changers, and can make terrain specific civs crazy OP.
